text: Tommaso Mattei was a 17th-century Italian architect. He was a pupil of Gianlorenzo Bernini and Carlo Rainaldi. Among his designs are the 1693 "capella nuova del miracolo" at the basilica di S. Cristina (this chapel was built to house the Corporal of Bolsena) and the cappella Montioni in Santa Maria in Montesanto, Rome. Category:17th-century Italian architects
title: Tommaso Mattei
